quahog 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Run Quahog

    run_quahog.Rd

    Run the quahog pipeline directly from R with a configurable config file.

    run_quahog(
  data_folder,
  output_folder = "/tmp/metabolomics_test",
  methodId,
  config_args = list(),
  path_to_mass_spec = "~/mass_spec",
  conda_env,
  conda_path,
  background = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    data_folder

    directory containing sample mzXML/mzML files.

    output_folder

    directory where output files should be saved.

    methodId

    mass spectrometry method being run (e.g., M001A)

    config_args

    list of config arguments to change from the method-specific defaults

    path_to_mass_spec

    path to mass_spec github repo

    conda_env

    conda environment to use when running quahog

    conda_path

    path to conda directory

    background

    run process in the background?

    Value

    a proc object for the pipeline running in the background

    Details

    This is only meant as a convenience function for running mzkit with an appropriate config during development. The primary methods for running quahog is via Docker.

    Contents
